text: Death on the Nile is a 2022 British-American mystery thriller movie directed by Kenneth Branagh. It is based on the 1937 novel of the same name by Agatha Christie. It is a sequel to 2017's Murder on the Orient Express. It stars Branagh returning as Hercule Poirot, along with Tom Bateman, Annette Bening, Russell Brand, Ali Fazal, Dawn French, Gal Gadot, Armie Hammer, Rose Leslie, Emma Mackey, Sophie Okonedo, Jennifer Saunders, and Letitia Wright. ==References== Category:2020s mystery movies Category:2022 thriller movies Category:2020s sequel movies Category:British mystery movies Category:British thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Kenneth Branagh Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Belgium Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set on ships
title: Death on the Nile (2022 movie)
